testcase.name: Fill the contact form
testcase.system-out: Given User should be on MagazinePage........................................passed When user click on contact link and navigate to contact form................passed Then current tab should appear as "https://magazine.trivago.com.au/contact/".passed When user enter value in message text box as "interview Test data".........passed When user enter value in full name text box as "Interview Triv".............passed When user enter value in email text box as "intTest@test.com"...............passed When user check the checkbox for contact form...............................passed When user click on submit button............................................passed Then user should get message as "Message Sent Successfully!"................passed

testcase.name: Click on Search and Enter Location
testcase.system-out: Given User should be on MagazinePage........................................passed When user click on search icon..............................................passed Then user should see the search field.......................................passed When user enter value in search box as "Canada" and search..................passed Then user should see all search result for "Canada".........................passed

testcase.name: Fill the contact form
testcase.system-out: Given User should be on MagazinePage........................................passed When user scroll down and navigate to news letter section...................passed Then user should see news letter section....................................passed When user enter random email address........................................passed When user click on Inspire Me button........................................passed Then user should get the "You are now checked-in!"..........................passed
